data.title: History of Shia in Thailand
data.meta_description: history of shia in thailand - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document discusses the history and development of Shi'ite Muslims in Thailand from the 16th century to present day. It describes how the original Shi'ite community, called Chao Sen, descended from Indo-Iranian Shi'ite ancestors who came to Thailand during the early 16th century. It also discusses a second group of Shi'ites, called Chi A Mai, who converted from other beliefs after the 1979 Iranian Revolution. The document provides historical context on the emergence of Shi'ite Islam and the Safavid dynasty in Iran.
